ELEMENT.CREATOR: JT
ELEMENT.TITLE: Subcategories, products and text
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout primarily features product in the main column with quantity boxes. In the right column are three linkable images interspersed between the subcategories and a text area. Multipage is turned off on this product list.

ELEMENT.HTML:
About this layout:
The layout contains many elements which you can populate. You dont HAVE to fill these in, the elements below them will shift up to fill vacancies. Do not confuse your customers by adding images that don't serve a specific purpose, such as linking them to a specific product or a specific category relevant to the main content on the page.

Subcategories:
The subcategories on this layout will appear in the right column with a thumbnail and category name. Descend tree is turned on, no root is turned off. More information about categories and definitions of terms can be found at the link below:
http://webdoc.zoovy.com/doc/50325

Product List
The product list is forced to a single column layout. You can set the alternating colors on/off through the editor.

Colors
The colors that are used for the borders and the column on the left are set by the theme that you are using. Changing themes will change those colors
